title: How to start with writing a novel - Flame of fiction. - Quora

response.answer_text: Before writing a novel, first you need to understand about the writing & before writing you need to understand about the reading. Write anything is not that simple because it involves many skills like experience, observation, deep analysis about the particular topic, personal opinion for that topic, vast vocabulary, perfect grammar etc.. First you should develop the reading , it enhances your knowledge and at the same time increases your word power. And of course these are the two swords of any writer. Second before you go to directly to the Novel writing first you should start to write essays and blogs. That will help to understand your level of writing and allows you to correct your silly and serious mistakes. Watch videos on youtube, take suggestions from experienced writers, improve your imagination & creativity, explore different places to change your perception, observe attentively, meet new people & understand their perceptive etc…. AND JUST START
